# Code of Conduct

## Our Standards

We are committed to a respectful, harassment-free environment for everyone.

Examples of positive behavior:
- Constructive and professional feedback
- Respectful disagreement on technical decisions
- Clear, evidence-based communication

Unacceptable behavior includes:
- Harassment, insults, or discrimination
- Personal attacks or hostile conduct
- Publishing others' private information without consent

## Enforcement

Project maintainers may remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, issues, and other contributions that violate this Code of Conduct.

## Reporting

Report conduct issues to:
- `michaelbothsieh@gmail.com`

All reports will be reviewed and handled confidentially where possible.
